title: Senior Python Developer
description:
We are seeking a Senior Python Developer to join our growing engineering team. 
        The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in Python development, cloud technologies, 
        and building scalable web applications.
requirements: Strong experience with Django or Flask frameworks
preferred_skills: Experience with Redis or other caching technologies
Experience with data analysis and visualization
responsibilities: Design and develop scalable Python applications
Implement machine learning models in production
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
